title: Development and characterization of a zeolite based drug delivery system: Application to cannabidiol oral delivery
content:
Publication date: 15 September 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 17

Author(s): Fouad Dernaika, Layal Halawy, Joseph Zeaiter, Sara Kawrani, Dima Mroue, Anthony Lteif, Sima Kourani, Mohamed Mehanna, Celine Abboud, Mohamad Mroueh, Aline Milane
